description: Pin Count is a 10-pin bowling scoring tool. It will keep your score in a standard scoring grid, allow you to score multiple players, save your scores and allow you to retrieve your scoring grids for display.
versionNote: New expanded statistics are available via the command menu on the current statistics card. Statistics now have No. strikes, spares, splits, split conversions, first ball pin average, and several other values for all games played or for a 3-game series.
